post.text: Beautiful evening in Kinston, North Carolina - thank you! Get out and VOTE!! You can watch tonight's rally here below! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Rachel
comment.text: Good people of NC . Help keep this Country ours! Hillary will turn it over to the Saudi's . First she will destroy our Constitution. Please vote for Donald J Trump to keep our U.S.A.

replies.author: Alison
replies.text: She is not turning our country over ro Saudis.

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Alison L She accepted all that money from the Saudi's and in one of the wiiki-leaks she was to accomplish "something" ready for them by 2020. Her term would be up if she won the election. They funded her campaign.
